author: Mirtilo

game.author: Minetest
game.name: minetest_game
game.short_description: The classic "Minetest". A lightweight and well-maintained base for modding
game.title: Minetest Game

long_description:
Baunilha is a texture pack that aims to create a refreshed look for Minetest Game. The goal is to create an aesthetic that is cohesive, vibrant and fun to build and explore, while maintaining a vanilla feel.

For now, the only mod it supports is Stamina, but I plan to update it for more mods in the future.
name: baunilha
short_description: Fresh and tasty textures with a vanilla flavor
title: Baunilha
